data.detailed_description:
ðŸ’ŽðŸ’ŽðŸ’ŽðŸ’ŽðŸ’ŽðŸ’ŽðŸ’ŽðŸ’Ž
A puzzle game that represents a jigsaw puzzle that you want to make from a variety of fragments of a pattern of various shapes. It is one of the most affordable toys that develop logical thinking, attention, memory, imagination.

Such wonderful pictures are very useful for the development of human thinking and cognitive abilities! According to psychologists, the game of puzzles contributes to the development of figurative and logical thinking, voluntary attention, perception, in particular, the distinction of individual elements in color, shape, size, etc. teaches how to perceive the connection between the part and the whole!

Control:
Start a new level on the mouse wheel;
Q - will open a hint

Features:

â˜… Beautiful artwork;
â˜… unforgettable adventures;
â˜… simple mouse control;
â˜… interesting gameplay;
â˜… Relaxing and romantic, light music.


Thank u abunyasha

data.short_description: A puzzle game that represents a jigsaw puzzle that you want to make from a variety of fragments of a pattern of various shapes. It is one of the most affordable toys that develop logical thinking, attention, memory, imagination.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound

content_descriptors.notes: This game is intended for adults. In the game there are perversions, pornography. In the background, I will be women who show their vaginas close up.
